description: Christy Bender can't help but giggle while she eagerly anticipates her big scene with the resident stallion, Cody Cummings.  This time Cody's starting things out slow.  He enjoys some deep, long kissing before the two watch each other play with themselves.  But shortly after Christy catches a glimpse of Cody's massive cock, she can't wait any longer.  Watch Cody give Christy a fuck she won't soon forget.  This is the type of action where Cody cranks up the intensity level.  A must see! Enjoy!
title: Too hot, they burn with desire...
